7. Belching may lead to hiccups, pain in the chest, cough and loss of appetite.
8. Yawning may lead to diseases of the eyes, throat, ear and nose.
9. Hunger may lead to nutritional disorders, body ache and weakness.
10. Thirst may lead to dryness of mouth and throat and fatigue.
11. Tears may lead to mental disorders, pain in chest, giddiness and digestive disorders.
12. Respiration may cause suffocation, respiratory disorders, heart disease and even death.
13. Sleep may cause insomnia, mental disorders, digestive disorders and 
diseases of sense organs.

There are three types of urges, expression of which create problems. They are 
concerned with mind, body and speech.
